channel.title: [317] Music?
channel.description:
Well, so I've been told, apparently music was done via some kinda webloader during the 317ish area...
Does anyone have this loader, or anymore information on this?... It's been bugging me for quite awhile since I haven't really seen anyone successfully make the music work on a 317... Feel free to prove me wrong, like I said I'm just looking for some info on this. :P
/endnoobpost

item.title: [317] Music?

Wanna post your edits?

item.title: [317] Music?
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:5, topic:413500”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=515001.msg3739611#msg3739611 date=1315248237]
Did some digging in the client. It appears that the music is actually in the cache and it does load it, but never really plays it? Hm.

EDIT:

Got music working on the 317 client.
[/quote]

Explain <3.[/quote]

Just made a few small edits in signlink and used the play music packet.

Read full topic
